text: Crossodactylus is a group of frogs in the family Hylodidae. These frogs live in Brazil, southern Paraguay, and northern Argentina. These frogs are sometimes known as Limnocharis, Tarsopterus, Calamobates, and by the English- language name spinythumb frogs. They typically inhabit streams in mountainous areas in the Atlantic Forest or in montane savanna. ==Species== There are 14 species: ==References== Category:Frogs of South America
title: Crossodactylus
